p: Sequences were trimmed and aligned using the ClustalW algorithm [ 46] in Geneious v11.1.5 [ 47]. MEGA v.10.1 [ 48] was used to find the best substitution model using Bayesian information criterion (BIC) scores, determining HKY+G as the best model for both viruses. Final alignments were 440 bp in the RdRp region for DWV and 360 bp in the vp3 region for KBV.
